definitions.text: a short note recognizing a source of information or of a quoted passage
examples: the student's essay failed to list several important citations
the acknowledgments are usually printed at the front of a book
the article includes mention of similar clinical cases

definitions.text: a passage or expression that is quoted or cited
a statement of the current market price of a security or commodity
the practice of quoting from books or plays etc.
examples: since he lacks originality he must rely on quotation
